pullRequest.title: Allow free license request from the Enterprise overview page

commit.message: always show a single Enterprise menu item if no plugin contributes something else in its place
remove System/Enterprise menu item, but leave its route intact
Use Route constant instead of hardcoding the path
Start a free enterprise license form
Store and post received license and improve UI
No need to submit the cluster ID from the UI
Don't trim form values to allow whitespace

nodes.bodyText:
This leads to a truncated form:

Can we make it a bit wider?
I would add a break after the first sentence to make it stand out a little more.

If the enterprise plugin isn't installed the internal links will end up in 404s, which isn't pretty.
Should we instead always link to the website?

commit.message:
Fix review comments

- Use full width for the form
- Some formatting of the text
- Always use documentation links so we don't show dead links if the
  enterprise plugins are not installed
Fix SystemMenu test after Enterprise removal

Fix test errors

When rendering a plugin menu entry in on the top-level nav bar, we
cannot use MenuItem but have to use NavItem.
